fields.name: memberToken
fields.label: Member Token
fields.description: An authenticated token for the user who the Trello cards should be created by.

fields.name: boardId
fields.label: Board Id
fields.description: The Id of the board you want to add the report to. The Id is a hex number visible in the URL when viewing the board.

fields.name: listName
fields.label: List Name
fields.description: The name of the list you want to add the report to. For Example 'To Do'

fields.name: labels
fields.label: Labels
fields.description: Comma separated list of label colors to apply to the card. Options: green, yellow, orange, red, purple, blue
